channel.title: Fixed on Hyperparameter Space
channel.description: Recent content in Fixed on Hyperparameter Space

item.title: about
item.description: My full name is Sergio Pablo Sanchez Cordero Gonzalez but I usually go (and publish) by Pablo Cordero. I’m currently a computational biologist at Hexagon Bio, mining the world’s fungalome for drugs. Previously, I’ve been a postdoc at UCSC’s systems biology group doing applied machine learning research on single-cell measurements and I did my doctoral work in RNA structure, the genomics of cardiovascular disease, and other things with Rhiju Das and Euan Ashley at Stanford University.
